@iridis_alpha  the only thing i can suggest is you ensure you block the program from connecting to the internet, even if it connects only for a short time the crack wont work...hope this helps

I had the same problem!

That is how I got it working:

- Close AnyDvd
- Important: Disable internet connection
- Uninstall AnyDvd with standard Uninstaller
- Download and install CCleaner
- Run CCleaner -> Registry cleaner
- Fix all entries (I recommend to backup registry)
- Important: Reboot PC, keep internet disconnected
- Install SlySoft AnyDvd
- Important: Reboot PC, keep internet disconnected
- Close AnyDvd if running
- Double Click Key file
- Click OK and start AnyDvd
- You will see, it will work as registered
--> Go to options
--> Disable automatic Updates
--> Enable "Show when AnyDvd need to contact update server"

That should work, do it step by step, don't leave anything out!

Also Bud this is a far better uninstaller than ccleaner

I also had a registration error but got it t work by following these steps:-

1. Disconnect from Internet
2. Install Program (then reboot)
3. Programme will open automatically but close it
4. To register first go to Start/Programmes/Slysoft/Register then navigate to where you initially extracted the files and load the licence from there
5. Run AnyDVD and Disable Auto Updates in Settings.

If you have any problems, try deleting the licence key then try again. Iâ€™m on Win7 x64Bit and it is located in C:\ProgramData\SlySoft\AnyDVD\AnyDVD.lic (you need to enable view hidden files to see this directory)
